ygData.subject: Re: Re: cast force spell
ygData.msgSnippet: I have had great success with these lately.  I group with a 28th level Enchanter and a 28th level Magician (and some tanks of course).  The Enchanter has an
ygData.messageBody:
I have had great success with these lately. I group with a 28th level
Enchanter and a 28th level Magician (and some tanks of course). The
Enchanter has an area affect stun spell, so once she casts that, the
Magician and I open up on the AE spells. Lather. Rinse. Repeat. :)

Works great! Even if all the Mobs turn and attack just the Magician
or myself, they are very quickly stunned again with the AE stun spell.

Soren
29th Level
Wizard



Joe Wallace wrote:

> From: "Joe Wallace" <joew88@...>
>
> I've started playing with the lvl 16 and lvl 24 AE damage spells lately.
> They have some surprisingly good uses. The lvl 29 Cast force is an
> excellent spell in just the right circumstances. But you have to be in a
> group that knows how to work with you.
> --------------------------------------------------------------
>
> Just a minor correction here. Cast force is a level 24 spell, not 29.
>
